verses.verse: Ask <WH7592> ye of the LORD <WH3068> rain <WH4306> in the time <WH6256> of the latter rain <WH4456>; so the LORD <WH3068> shall make <WH6213> bright clouds <WH2385>, and give <WH5414> them showers <WH1653> of rain <WH4306>, to every one <WH376> grass <WH6212> in the field <WH7704>. bright: or, lightnings

For the idols <WH8655> have spoken <WH1696> vanity <WH205>, and the diviners <WH7080> have seen <WH2372> a lie <WH8267>, and have told <WH1696> false <WH7723> dreams <WH2472>; they comfort <WH5162> in vain <WH1892>: therefore they went <WH5265> their way as a flock <WH6629>, they were troubled <WH6031>, because there was no shepherd <WH7462>. idols: Heb. teraphims were: or, answered that, etc

Mine anger <WH639> was kindled <WH2734> against the shepherds <WH7462>, and I punished <WH6485> the goats <WH6260>: for the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> hath visited <WH6485> his flock <WH5739> the house <WH1004> of Judah <WH3063>, and hath made <WH7760> them as his goodly <WH1935> horse <WH5483> in the battle <WH4421>. punished: Heb. visited upon
Out of him came forth <WH3318> the corner <WH6438>, out of him the nail <WH3489>, out of him the battle <WH4421> bow <WH7198>, out of him every oppressor <WH5065> together <WH3162>.

And they shall be as mighty <WH1368> men, which tread down <WH947> their enemies in the mire <WH2916> of the streets <WH2351> in the battle <WH4421>: and they shall fight <WH3898>, because the LORD <WH3068> is with them, and the riders <WH7392> on horses <WH5483> shall be confounded <WH3001>. the riders: or, they shall make the riders on horses ashamed

And I will strengthen <WH1396> the house <WH1004> of Judah <WH3063>, and I will save <WH3467> the house <WH1004> of Joseph <WH3130>, and I will bring them again to place <WH3427> them; for I have mercy <WH7355> upon them: and they shall be as though <WH834> I had not cast them off <WH2186>: for I am the LORD <WH3068> their God <WH430>, and will hear <WH6030> them.

And they of Ephraim <WH669> shall be like a mighty <WH1368> man, and their heart <WH3820> shall rejoice <WH8055> as through wine <WH3196>: yea, their children <WH1121> shall see <WH7200> it, and be glad <WH8055>; their heart <WH3820> shall rejoice <WH1523> in the LORD <WH3068>.
I will hiss <WH8319> for them, and gather <WH6908> them; for I have redeemed <WH6299> them: and they shall increase <WH7235> as they have increased <WH7235>.

And I will sow <WH2232> them among the people <WH5971>: and they shall remember <WH2142> me in far countries <WH4801>; and they shall live <WH2421> with their children <WH1121>, and turn again <WH7725>.

I will bring them again <WH7725> also out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, and gather <WH6908> them out of Assyria <WH804>; and I will bring <WH935> them into the land <WH776> of Gilead <WH1568> and Lebanon <WH3844>; and place shall not be found <WH4672> for them.

And he shall pass through <WH5674> the sea <WH3220> with affliction <WH6869>, and shall smite <WH5221> the waves <WH1530> in the sea <WH3220>, and all the deeps <WH4688> of the river <WH2975> shall dry up <WH3001>: and the pride <WH1347> of Assyria <WH804> shall be brought down <WH3381>, and the sceptre <WH7626> of Egypt <WH4714> shall depart away <WH5493>.
And I will strengthen <WH1396> them in the LORD <WH3068>; and they shall walk up and down <WH1980> in his name <WH8034>, saith <WH5002> the LORD <WH3068>.
